cards.description: [ACTIVATED] Add one or more copies of 'Useless Potion' from your Deck to your Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to a Champion then Return this card to the Hand then if you have 3 or more cards in Hand: Discard 1 card.
[ACTIVATED] Discard 1 'Dagger' Equipment then Add 1 Equipment from your Deck to your Hand of the same element as the card discarded.
[ACTIVATED] Discard 1 Water Equipment then Heal 30 damage from a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Discard 1 Fire Equipment then Deal 30 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Discard 1 Air Equipment then Draw 3 cards and Discard 1 card.
[ACTIVATED] Discard 1 Earth Equipment then Add 1 Earth Equipment from your Deck to your Hand and Discard 1 card.
[ACTIVATED] If your opponent equipped 1 Equipment last turn: Destroy that Equipment.
